@NonNullApi

Package com.github.themrmilchmann.mjl.options

MJL Options is a Java implementation of the sane-argv specification for command line parameter parsing.
See Also:
OptionParser
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValueParser<T>
    A ValueParser provides a conversion method to convert a String to a value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument<T>
    Arguments are index-based interpreted parameters.
    Argument.Builder<T>
    A builder for an Argument.
    Option<T>
    Options are key-based interpreted parameters.
    Option.Builder<T>
    A builder for an Option.
    OptionParser
    Option parser interface.
    OptionPool
    An OptionPool is a collection of available arguments and options.
    OptionPool.Builder
    A builder for an OptionPool.
    OptionSet
    An OptionSet represents a collection of arguments and options associated with their parsed values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParsingException
    A ParsingException indicates failure while parsing a command.
